text.p: The following matrix is not in RREF.
However, you can apply a single row operation to put it into RREF. What matrix is the result?

div.p: To enter the matrix [mathjaxinline]\left[ \begin{array}{ccc} 0& 1& 2 \\ 1& 2& 3 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline], type [[0,1,2],[1,2,3]]. (Type the same thing if you want to enter the augmented matrix [mathjaxinline]\left[ \begin{array}{cc:c} 0& 1& 2 \\ 1& 2& 3 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline].)

font.p: Note that the matrix currently satisfies all conditions except “Each pivot is the only non-zero entry in its column", for there is a [mathjaxinline]-2[/mathjaxinline] above the pivot in the third row. We can add two times row three to row two and replace row 2 with the result. Doing so, we obtain
